original_text:
Magic Wilds
Magic Wilds è una delle più recenti  video slot gratis di Red Rake Gaming. Un misterioso mago è il protagonista principale di questa slot a cinque rulli che beneficia di 32 linee di pagamento nel gioco base e di 100 paylines durante la funzione Giri gratuiti. Il Mago si trasformerà in Wild ogni volta che apparirà sui rulli e, se impilato, di replicherà su rulli in modo casuale, grazie alla proiezione astrale. SEgui con attenzione i suoi incantesimi e vinci i premi in palio!
Simbologia e funzionalità magiche
Osserva come il grande Mago trasforma i tuoi giri in grandi vittorie quasi ogni volta che appare sui rulli:

Il Mago atterra in pile, può coprire l’intera bobina e si trasforma  nel simbolo Wild ogni volta che appare, sostituendo tutti i simboli regolari
Il palazzo infestato dai maghi è lo Scatter che attiva la funzione Giri gratuiti.
Il medaglione del drago e il libro degli incantesimi sono le principali fonti di magia per il nostro misterioso stregone. Inoltre, per i suoi trucchi, ha bisogno di usare cristalli di smeraldo, rubino e diamante, nonché diversi tipi di rune.

Con la Funzione Free Spins, i rulli magici possono arrivare fino a 8 celle, mentre gli Hocus Pocus Scatters ti regalano bonus extra.
Puntate e Pagamenti disponibili
Si parte da una scommessa iniziale di 0,10€ fino a  50,00€ per singolo giro. Ricorda che se ottieni cinque jolly su una payline vincerai 15 volte la scommessa. Tutti e tre i Gargoyle pagano lo stesso, cinque volte la puntata per la combinazione massima. Attiva la funzione Free Spins e sblocca tutte e 100 le linee di pagamento. La funzione di proiezione astrale ti aiuterà anche a vincere alla grande insieme all’RTP che è del 95,3%.
Qual è il mio Verdetto finale?
Red Rake Gaming ha fatto un lavoro davvero buono con Magic Wilds, che nei nostri casinò online si presenta in modalità demo e in versione a pagamento. Il Mago che diventa selvaggio ogni volta che appare sui rulli e la funzione  Astral Projection che trasforma i rulli in rulli Wild aggiungono importanti potenzialità di vittoria. Inoltre, l’espansione Free Spins può fino a 8 celle in altezza è un ulteriore elemento di vantaggio.

raw_translation.response:
Magic Wilds
Magic Wilds is one of the latest free video slots from Red Rake Gaming. This five-reel slot has 32 paylines in the base game and 100 paylines during the Free Spins feature, where a mysterious magician is the main character. The Magician will transform into a Wild every time he appears on the reels and, if stacked, will replicate onto random reels, thanks to the Astral Projection feature. Follow his spells carefully and win the prizes up for grabs! 

Magical Symbols and Features
Watch as the great Magician transforms your spins into big wins almost every time he appears on the reels:

- The Magician lands in stacks, can cover the entire reel and transforms into the Wild symbol every time he appears, substituting all regular symbols.
- The haunted wizard palace is the Scatter symbol that triggers the Free Spins feature.
- The dragon medallion and the book of spells are the main sources of magic for our mysterious wizard. To perform his tricks, he needs to use emerald, ruby, and diamond crystals, as well as various types of runes.

With the Free Spins feature, the magic reels can reach up to 8 cells, while the Hocus Pocus Scatters give you extra bonuses. 

Available Bets and Payouts
You can start with an initial bet of €0.10 and go up to €50 per spin. Remember that if you get five wilds on a payline, you win 15 times your bet. All three gargoyles pay the same with five times the bet for the maximum combination. Activate the Free Spins feature and unlock all 100 paylines. The Astral Projection feature will also help you win big, together with an RTP of 95.3%. 

What's my Final Verdict?
Red Rake Gaming has done a really good job with Magic Wilds, which is available in demo and paid versions at our online casinos. The Magician that becomes wild every time he appears on the reels and the Astral Projection feature that transforms the reels into wild reels add important winning potential. Furthermore, the Free Spins expansion can go up to 8 cells high, which is an additional advantage. As an experienced gambler, I highly recommend trying this slot game out!

Review: Magic Wilds
Magic Wilds is one of the latest free video slots from Red Rake Gaming. This five-reel slot has 32 paylines in the base game and 100 paylines during the Free Spins feature, where a mysterious magician is the main character. The Magician will transform into a Wild every time he appears on the reels and, if stacked, will replicate onto random reels, thanks to the Astral Projection feature. Follow his spells carefully and win the prizes up for grabs! 

Magical Symbols and Features
Watch as the great Magician transforms your spins into big wins almost every time he appears on the reels:

- The Magician lands in stacks, can cover the entire reel and transforms into the Wild symbol every time he appears, substituting all regular symbols.
- The haunted wizard palace is the Scatter symbol that triggers the Free Spins feature.
- The dragon medallion and the book of spells are the main sources of magic for our mysterious wizard. To perform his tricks, he needs to use emerald, ruby, and diamond crystals, as well as various types of runes.

With the Free Spins feature, the magic reels can reach up to 8 cells, while the Hocus Pocus Scatters give you extra bonuses. 

Available Bets and Payouts
You can start with an initial bet of €0.10 and go up to €50 per spin. Remember that if you get five wilds on a payline, you win 15 times your bet. All three gargoyles pay the same with five times the bet for the maximum combination. Activate the Free Spins feature and unlock all 100 paylines. The Astral Projection feature will also help you win big, together with an RTP of 95.3%. 

What's my Final Verdict?
Red Rake Gaming has done a really good job with Magic Wilds, which is available in demo and paid versions at our online casinos. The Magician that becomes wild every time he appears on the reels and the Astral Projection feature that transforms the reels into wild reels add important winning potential. Furthermore, the Free Spins expansion can go up to 8 cells high, which is an additional advantage. As an experienced gambler, I highly recommend trying this slot game out!
